synopsis: A bunch of Cubs with different ages start their trip on their ship and take some equipment with them like guns, a vehicle, and medical things. All is going well until a wormhole takes them in a different world of dinosaurs! They wake up at a beach where they see a pterodactyl falling dead from an attack of arrows. They find the baby of that dino and take it with them. Then, they get back to the ship, and some soldiers riding dinos arrive and search the baby. The impulsive Godo shoots them and makes them angry. Their adventure begins here, haunted by the army, and nowhere to go. They start exploring the island more with their vehicle.

Godo and Boss have a fight and get into the river.Then the group have a stay on the coast and talking,and understanding this world better.
On the other hand, Mosar arrives at the place where they left their ship, and understands that some thing's not going well. He finds out electricity. Then Godo's madness goes up finding him wanna kill the little pterodactyl. This is cut when army finds them and hunts them. Godo drives the vehicle,and kills a triceratops by mistake.The gang of triceratops start running everywhere,and that makes the army run away.The group stands to look the animal they killed, and it's baby crying beside it.

The group gets the little triceratops with them as a solution of killing his mother.They stop in the nowhere, to have a bath,eat something and sleep.The next day, Boss,Tiger and Tank, climb at the top of a mountain to figure out where they are and which road to take. King seems to be interested in the group,cause soldiers of Mosar showed him a bullet, thinking that it will be nice for his kingdom.Godo decides by his own to be the leader,and that moment Mosar finds them.He puts the group in the vehicle leaving behind Boss,Tiger,Tank and the little pterodactyl,Zans. Manua appears and helps them,looking in their eyes and finding hope and courage on them.She gets the army away and Boss saves Zans from the sword of Mosar.

The group is hinding in the forest.Manua,as she sees that they don't have a place to go, invites them to her house.She is the daughter of the mayor of the city of Lupar.Boss and many others trust her because she felt angry,when soldiers killed some dinosaurs.They go to the basement,and stay there.They decided to choose President as leader.In the evening Boss,Tiger,Tank and President got free some dinosaurs. When soldiers where hunting them,Manua showed them a way to  hide.

After they gave freedom to the dinosaurs,they got bigger trouble.Next morning, Mosar is coming to town of Lupar. Mayor, orginized a party for Mosar.The group gives Gon the little triceratops whose mother killed by them,to Manua. Kids explore every room in the house. The party begins and Mosar is dancing with Manua.Then Mosar speaks to the crowd about the kids they are hunting and says that he who will give them a home, will be killed. Godo and snake,who was in the party room, make noise and soldiers start looking everywhere. The group goes to their car and leave the town emediately,while Mosar cought Manua for helping them.

The group stopped in the forest where they decide to get back to the town of Lupar and save Manua from execution when they see that Mosar ordered his soldiers to kill her dinosaurs, Silver. Godo, Snake and Nerd is not in with this,but despite that,they help.Next morning start their plan.The time to execute Manua came,Boss is taking the attention of everyone,and Young Boy and Tank saved Manua.Tiger gives signal to President to come with the vehicle,Godo opens the doors and they are safe,but Mosar got Boss who is saved by the group.Soldiers hunt them,but they went into a river,where they fall down the waterfall.

Hopefully,they are safe by falling and river leads them far away from the town,to the Lake of the Gods,where there is a rumor that legs get rot if you get into it.Despite of all this, they get into the Ruins of Gods,where,it is said that Gods shared the sky. Boss takes the group in there,cause they also "shared the sky" when they got in this world. In there,they learn about Traveler of Time,which can travel far away from time and space.Soldiers came to catch the kids,but Priests don't let them,not even Mosar,cause this place is controlled only by the gods and priests as they say.Priests also said that they will give the group to the Gods to punish them.They get into the temple,but Godo pushes a crystal in a machine,thinking that it is the Traveler of Time, and the temple starts being destroyed.The group gets away from there.

The group of Cubs fled to the other side of the lake and Mosar must be hurry to catch them.Princess gives the fault to Godo for the destruction of the temple. Godo asks Princess to go with him to the place where they came to the beach but she is negative.Then Godo decides to go alone there, by robbing the vehicle. Snake and Nerd go with him.He do it,he shows Manua a gun,and hits her to fall down of the vehicle, and leave them all back. Boss,Tiger,Tank and Princess climb the mountain and push a rock to the road,in order to stop Godo.They get the car, soldiers came and Godo,Snake and Nerd fleeing into the forest,where they where caught .

Manua,Tiger and Boss go to a village nearby to get information about the army and the kids are prisoned. President and others stayed behind to make camps.President gives to the children a "family atmosphere" by making him the Father, and Princess the Mother. Princess, freaks out. On the other hand, Mosar gives a bath to Godo,Snake and Nerd, and a table full of food for them.He tells them that they are valuable for the kingdom,cause of their technology.Godo tells that he will help,and shows them how fire,explodes powder.

The group is heading to the harbor of the town of Kasarba.On their road,they find a man who is the leader of a circous,and he hides them.Mosar gives the order to the mayor to catch the kids if he see them.When they arrive to town, a dinosaur,Baky, tells Zans about his father,White wing,who was against the king,and was executed.Baky,also,tells the group about the Traveler of Time, that it's located in the continent of Lemuria.Soldiers prison Baky,because he hit them,when they hit his boss.When the show begins,Boss,Tiger and Tank save Baky, and get away.

The group have a stay, in the forest,and Manua shows them where is the continent of Lemuria on a mini map.Two thieves kidnap Doc,Tiger and Princess. Their leader falls in love with Doc and wants to mary her. Doc tells him the truth, how they all came to this world but he doesn't understand. Boss and Tank find their hide. They make a plan to save the girls and they do it. They become friends with the thieves, and the leader,let them free to go. He also tells them to find his brother,a pirate on the harbor of Kasarba. Mosar who is already to this harbor gets more and more information from Godo.

The group arrives to the town of Kasabra.There they meet Mid,a developer. Boss and Tiger go to his house.Manua,President and Princess looks for Gangara,a man who would help them.Priests prison Mid because he is trying to develop technology.Gangara betrays Manua,President and Princess to the army.Boss and Tiger fix the half-ended motoplane that Mid was trying to fly,and they save him.Manua run away and fled.She found Boss,Tiger and Mid.

The group is prisoned on the same place,where Godo and others live,with Mosar.Mosar is trying to get the kids for the King, but the priests don't let him.Kangara,after he regreted,he helps Mid,Tiger and Boss,get inside the Keep,where all the group is.Godo asks Princess to stay with him,but she gets away with the group,after Boss saved them.Godo,informs Mosar about the others, and Boss goes to the temple of the priests to save Zans. Pirates come and save the group from Mosar.

Pirates ask the group for money in order to save them,and because they don't have,they keep them prisoned.It seems that pirates have trouble with Edoroak.Their captain seems to be in the mystical system against te king,such as Manua.Mosar learns that Edoroak hunts them and  he goes too.The Captain of the pirates tells the kids about the Traveler of Time, that it's in a temple,which Davonta made.Mosar arrives and both armies shoot against pirates and the group.By the help of pirates, the group manage to flee.

The group found the island that pirates told them about. There, they meet Davonta and Mid, who worked for him. Priestess prison them, and lead them to Priestess Jalie.She tells them for the Traveler of Time. Mosar learns where they are,from a pirate.Davonta upgrades every vehicle, the group have,and changed the shape of their car.Mosar arrives to the island but Priestess Jalie doesn't let him pass,and hides the kids.After a while,Mosar shoots their car,while they are taking a road,that Davonta told.Priestess Jalie cut the sea in half and they pass to the oposite as she said.

title.jp: In the clutches of Red Nail
Farewell to the Planet of the Dinosaurs
